locations.name: Rishikesh
locations.description: Experience zip lining above the Ganges with beautiful views of the surrounding hills.

locations.name: Mahabalipuram
locations.description: Zip line across the beautiful coastal views near the UNESCO World Heritage sites.

locations.name: Wayanad
locations.description: Experience zip lining through the lush greenery and scenic hills.

locations.name: Nainital
locations.description: A thrilling zip-lining experience above the stunning Naini Lake and surrounding forests.

locations.name: Kuala Lumpur
locations.description: For international travelers, zip lining across the iconic KL skyline.

locations.name: Agra
locations.description: Experience zip lining with a unique view of the Taj Mahal in the background.

locations.name: Shimla
locations.description: Experience the thrill of zip lining in the hills and valleys of Shimla.

locations.name: Kodaikanal
locations.description: Zip line across breathtaking views of the Western Ghats and misty mountains.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to December

locations.name: Goa
locations.description: Zip line above the lush green landscapes and beaches of Goa.

locations.name: Pondicherry
locations.description: Enjoy a zip line experience with beautiful views of the coastal town.
